body:
Can't build QT, was originally trying to build it as a dependency of VTK but when it failed I tried to build it on it's own. Fails at configure stage. Error is `Project ERROR: failed to parse default search paths from compiler output.`

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install qt@5.13.1%clang
...
==> Installing qt
==> Searching for binary cache of qt
==> Finding buildcaches in /spack/var/spack/cache/build_cache
==> No binary for qt found: installing from source
==> Warning: microarchitecture specific optimizations are not supported yet on mixed compiler toolchains [check clang@8.0.0 for further details]
==> Using cached archive: /spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/ad/adf00266dc38352a166a9739f1a24a1e36f1be9c04bf72e16e142a256436974e.tar.xz
==> Staging archive: /tmp/username/spack-stage/spack-stage-qt-5.13.1-xdnaqy3o2zag2pzghikfuxipprel7kfs/qt-everywhere-src-5.13.1.tar.xz
==> Created stage in /tmp/username/spack-stage/spack-stage-qt-5.13.1-xdnaqy3o2zag2pzghikfuxipprel7kfs
==> Applied patch /spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/qt/btn_trigger_happy.patch
==> Applied patch /spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/qt/qt5-pcre.patch
==> Ran patch() for qt
==> Building qt [Package]
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 3:
    './configure' '-no-eglfs' '-no-directfb' '-no-gtk' '-prefix' '/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/qt-5.13.1-xdnaqy3o2zag2pzghikfuxipprel7kfs' '-v' '-opensource' '-no-opengl' '-release' '-confirm-license' '-openssl-linked' '-L/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/openssl-1.1.1d-tacmwdgknf5swmnsb6qsholturwwuiev/lib' '-I/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/openssl-1.1.1d-tacmwdgknf5swmnsb6qsholturwwuiev/include' '-optimized-qmake' '-no-pch' '-system-freetype' '-I/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/freetype-2.10.1-hjzon523uu2w3sisys733h7qi356rg3y/include/freetype2' '-fontconfig' '-openssl-linked' '-system-sqlite' '-shared' '-system-harfbuzz' '-L/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/harfbuzz-2.3.1-qlk4hz6nsv327oue2ak2xdtzsaan4e7p/lib' '-I/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/harfbuzz-2.3.1-qlk4hz6nsv327oue2ak2xdtzsaan4e7p/include' '-system-pcre' '-L/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/pcre2-10.31-3iody5eliq2hnamatvr7vz6zvjzqhqx4/lib' '-I/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/pcre2-10.31-3iody5eliq2hnamatvr7vz6zvjzqhqx4/include' '-system-doubleconversion' '-L/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/double-conversion-2.0.1-mnmy7qk6ari3fgieie6frrsyxeuyaipb/lib' '-I/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/double-conversion-2.0.1-mnmy7qk6ari3fgieie6frrsyxeuyaipb/include' '-system-libpng' '-L/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/libpng-1.6.37-mqs5wdlxe5ho5gqlgbzxpqbjtessi7ao/lib' '-I/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/libpng-1.6.37-mqs5wdlxe5ho5gqlgbzxpqbjtessi7ao/include' '-system-libjpeg' '-L/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/libjpeg-turbo-2.0.3-hcjnapf3miwxnvoi26uh7hxkzb7fbwjm/lib' '-I/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/libjpeg-turbo-2.0.3-hcjnapf3miwxnvoi26uh7hxkzb7fbwjm/include' '-system-zlib' '-L/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/zlib-1.2.11-53b2a2gu5dcn52jeq7p4qhz6jm5j4r6r/lib' '-I/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/zlib-1.2.11-53b2a2gu5dcn52jeq7p4qhz6jm5j4r6r/include' '-nomake' 'examples' '-no-dbus' '-system-xcb' '-skip' 'webengine' '-skip' 'webglplugin' '-skip' 'wayland'
See build log for details:
  /tmp/username/spack-stage/spack-stage-qt-5.13.1-xdnaqy3o2zag2pzghikfuxipprel7kfs/spack-build-out.txt

```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux pcname 4.15.0-66-generic #75~16.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Tue Oct 1 14:01:08 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Ubuntu 16.04.6 LTS
``` 

### Additional information

The contents of the build log: 

```console

'-L/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake/clang-8.0.0/double-conversion-2.0.1-mnmy7qk6ari3fgieie6frrsyxeuyaipb/lib' title: Installation issue: qt
